| [preventAutoclose?](./terminal.iterminalwritableoptions.preventautoclose.md) |           | boolean                                                 | <p><i>(Optional)</i> When this object is the [TerminalTransform.destination](./terminal.terminaltransform.destination.md) for a transform, the transform will automatically close this object.
